author: blair
msg: Allow use of neon 0.21.3 but don't require it.  This version fixes the
Fix segfault if using proxy server with SSL session and server
Fix leak of proxy hostname once per session (if a proxy is used).
Update the check for the neon version.

author: blair
msg: Make it easier to follow file and directory renames by presenting to
the user those files and directories that have been added to the
import directory and deleted from the working copy so that the user
can match them up.  Perform svn mv's on the user specified files and
and checks for the success or failure of the command.  It quits
the script if the child process fails for any reason.
(filter_renamed_files): New subroutine to remove from a list of
files and directories a list of files and directories that have
been renamed.  This is used since svn does not delete renamed
directories until committed and old pre-renamed directories should
(recusurive_ls_and_hash): New subroutine that given a directory
name, returns a hash keyed by filename whose value is a hash
containing the type of file and its digest hash if it is a file.
(digest_hash_file): Check for the correct number of arguments.
Use Text::Wrap to wrap all log messages to 72 characters.
Replace all the calls to safe_read_from_pipe that require a
successful result with calls to read_from_process.
Let the user specify files and directories to rename in the
working copy and use svn mv to perform the renames.
Move the code that performs the finds of files and directories in
the source and working copy directories into the rename loop.
Change the temporary working directory template from
